1.0.2.en: Fixed and added flow cards, added option to custom pooling interval, minor fixes

1.0.3.en: Changes in flow cards, app description etc.

1.1.0.en: Added THEN cards to control your wallbox

1.2.1.en: Added monthly a yearly charged kWh, better logic on currently charged kWh

1.2.5.en: updated widget, added button for pause/resume charging, added new flow card which converts W to Amps for charger

1.3.0.en: New capabilites and settings for better use of dynamic mode charging and max use of local V2C API

1.3.1.en: Better handling of API errors and updating monthly/yearly data

1.3.2.en: Better logic on new trigger and capability, to reduce false positive triggers on API communication fail

1.3.3.en: Better logic on new trigger and capability, to reduce false positive triggers on API communication fail

1.4.2.en: Added new AND and THEN cards for better handling of your solar surpluses, change to Set power to W (added possibility to change rounding of result AMPs)

1.4.3.en: Better logic on API fail trigger, code optimalisation

1.4.5.en: Deleted app settings page, small bugfix

1.4.6.en: Bugfix, added flowcards for monthly and yearly statistics

1.4.7.en: Added energy manager for better handling of energy statistics

1.4.8.en: Added Ko-Fi as way to support development

1.4.9.en: Removed Ko-Fi donations and added GitHub sponsors to support app
